changelog: New Project dialog layout now opens correctly on first render without manual resize.
Project editor responsiveness was improved with safer adaptive sizing and scroll behavior.
Instant sync fallback logic was hardened for lightweight repositories and test environments.
Remote MongoDB replica-set helper script was added for professional server-side setup.
Stable per-device identity utility added to reduce cross-device collision risks.
notes_ar: هذا الإصدار يحسن فتح شاشة مشروع جديد تلقائياً ويقوي استقرار المزامنة الفورية مع أدوات احترافية لإعداد Replica Set.
notes_en: This release improves first-open project dialog layout, strengthens realtime sync stability, and adds professional replica-set setup tooling.
